snippet: The Police Department’s anti-terrorism unit combs the city’s jails for Muslim immigrants to see if any might be persuaded to become police informants.
abstract: Documents reveal that squad of New York City detectives known as Citywide Debriefing Team has combed city's jails for Muslim immigrants to see if any might be persuaded to become police informants; effort began few years after Sept 11 terrorist attacks; continuing work of debriefing team shows that while department has disbanded controversial surveillance unit sent into Muslim communities, it is still using other counterterrorism initiatives.
lead_paragraph: The Police Department’s anti-terrorism unit combs the city’s jails for Muslim immigrants to see if any might be persuaded to become police informants.

headline.main: New York Police Recruit Muslims to Be Informers
headline.print_headline: New York Police Recruit Muslims to Be Informers
